metadata.title: CVE-2017-0647 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in libziparchive could enable alocal malicious application to access data outside of its permissionlevels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it could be used to accesssensitive data without permission. Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2,5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36392138.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
android-platform-system-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
